content: दोस् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [दम्यते अनेन दम् दोऽसि अर्द्धर्चा°; <ls>Uṇ. 2. 69</ls>] (दोषन is optionally substituted for this word after <ab>acc.</ab> dual) {@--1@} The forearm, the arm; तमुपाद्रवदुद्यम्य दक्षिणं दोर्निशाचरः <ls>R. 15. 23</ls>; हेमपात्रगतं दोर्भ्यामादधानं पयश्चरु <ls n="R.">10. 51</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 76.</ls> {@--2@} The part of an are defining its sine. {@--3@} The side of a triangle or square.
